originalText.text:
Edit: Kicked me out for using bathroom with note saying not use, despite other tenants doing so.

Dosent offer anything you can't find online. Always put me in dangerous shelters. Their own housing is full of other dangerous convicts that steal stuff.

There is no services in this country. Only offers food that I'm highly allergic to. No solutions to my problems. All I have is suffering.

originalText.text: It is a great place for case workers and educational resources.

text.text: It is a great place for case workers and educational resources.

originalText.text: The fortune society is a big help to my re-entry back to the community the fortune society has helped me with basically everything I had need assistance with, the Fortune has wonderful things. trust and believe that if you are seeking for help formerly incarcerated,they help with housing they help with your SNAP benefits they help with job placement, and if you need to trade that's the place to go to the staff is wonderful I appreciate every single one of them ❤️

text.text: The fortune society is a big help to my re-entry back to the community the fortune society has helped me with basically everything I had need assistance with, the Fortune has wonderful things. trust and believe that if you are seeking for help formerly incarcerated,they help with housing they help with your SNAP benefits they help with job placement, and if you need to trade that's the place to go to the staff is wonderful I appreciate every single one of them ❤️

originalText.text: I work here so I'm biased,  but the dedication of the staff and the quality of services at Fortune is second to none.  If you or someone you know has had criminal justice involvement and you need assistance with ANYTHING - Fortune Society is the best place in New York City to get help and to be treated with dignity and equality.

text.text: I work here so I'm biased,  but the dedication of the staff and the quality of services at Fortune is second to none.  If you or someone you know has had criminal justice involvement and you need assistance with ANYTHING - Fortune Society is the best place in New York City to get help and to be treated with dignity and equality.

originalText.text: Fortune Society is a great program , that offers an opportunity to rehabilitate and reestablish men and woman who have been incarcerated. It gives them the tools to work for a better future. It offers a transitional housing program, to accomadate them because of their criminal backgrounds. During this transition fortune equips and educates these men and women back into society in assisting them in all their needs. Fortune Society is a great program that has return the lives of men and woman who thought their was no hope. Although I was never incarcerated I have had the privilege to join in the computer classes at fortune with Our instructor Rene Sing. I have upgraded many all of my computer skills because of this class. I am grateful and honor to be a volunteer of fortune. Amen Wilda Colon
